# dataDecodingStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategy that a decoder uses to decode raw data.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataDecodingStrategy: JSONDecoder.DataDecodingStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default strategy is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/DataDecodingStrategy-swift.enum/base64] strategy.

## Decoding Raw Data

- **JSONDecoder.DataDecodingStrategy**: The strategies for decoding raw data.
